student.whoWeAreDesc: We are a passionate team of educators and technology enthusiasts dedicated to revolutionizing online learning. Our platform connects students with expert instructors from around the world, creating meaningful learning experiences that transcend geographical boundaries.
student.whatWeDoDesc: EduPlatform provides a comprehensive learning management system that enables personalized education journeys. We offer interactive courses, real-time collaboration tools, progress tracking, and direct communication channels between students and educators.
student.ourMissionDesc: To democratize quality education by making it accessible, affordable, and engaging for learners everywhere. We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to learn, grow, and achieve their full potential regardless of their background.

home.whoWeAreDesc: EduPlatform is a digital hub for educators. Our webapp empowers faculty to post courses, share material, and manage student interactions. Built for engagement and flexibility, it's the ultimate space for teachers to build their classroom community online!
home.darkModeDesc: Eye-friendly dark experience while preserving teacher custom colors

home.easySettingsDesc: Simple and intuitive language and theme controls

assessments.areYouSureDeleteAssessment:
Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"?

This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove:
• The assessment and all its questions
• All student attempts and results
• All associated data

Type 'DELETE' to confirm this action.
